biotools.summary: GCsnap is a flexible Python-based tool that allows for the interactive comparison of the genomic contexts of protein-coding genes from any genome at any taxonomic level, integrating them with functional and structural information for any of the genes shown.

bioschemas.name: GCsnap
bioschemas.summary: GCsnap is a flexible Python-based tool that allows for the interactive comparison of the genomic contexts of protein-coding genes from any genome at any taxonomic level, integrating them with functional and structural information for any of the genes shown.
